name: integrations-hub
description: A monorepo for integrations hub with server and UI layers

scripts.dev: bun run --cwd packages/server dev & bun run --cwd packages/ui dev
scripts.build: bun run --cwd packages/server build && bun run --cwd packages/ui build
scripts.test: bun run --cwd packages/server test && bun run --cwd packages/ui test
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd packages/server lint && bun run --cwd packages/ui lint
scripts.clean: bun run --cwd packages/server clean && bun run --cwd packages/ui clean
scripts.type-check: bun run --cwd packages/server type-check && bun run --cwd packages/ui type-check
